video.title: Salvage Hunters
video.synopsis: Spotting treasures where others simply see garbage, Drew Pritchard acquires and restores forgotten gems to sell at his showroom for a big profit.

episodes.synopsis: Combing the country for one-off items to restore, treasure hunter Drew Pritchard visits a sprawling Scottish estate and a scrapyard in Coventry.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: With sales manager Mark along for his first buying expedition, Drew gets unprecedented access to the largest traveling vintage fun fair in the world.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When a first-time buyer from France places a mammoth order that clears out the shop's inventory, Drew hits the road to hunt down more stock.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A Devon salvage yard is a treasure trove; the guys visit Europe's largest air salvage yard; Drew views an offbeat inventor's strange collection.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Drew visits some legendary hoarders and eccentrics, and although they have incredible collections, they're also notoriously unwilling to sell.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Julian dive into the rat-infested sheds of a cash-strapped baronet; car hater Gavin has a change of heart; the boys joyride in a tank.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Julian visit a Bakelite museum. Drew's salvage mojo is rekindled when he gets an unexpected invitation to an old country house.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Drew and Julian visit an airplane scrapyard where the collection is staggering. The guys head to a Dorset farm with a slew of charming old buildings.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Drew examines goods at a props and costumes warehouse; a Citroën reignites Drew's car-buying demons; Drew visits a series of compulsive collectors.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: On a country house marathon, Drew and Julian look inside a property that's being turned into a hotel and uncover a room full of vintage taxidermy.
episodes.title: Salvage Hunters: Season 1: Episode 10
